entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then flurries and rain showers beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries and rain showers changing to rain showers and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres late in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
